content.prompt: During his administration, Washington pursued the foreign policy suggested by the excerpt in part because he believed that the

choices.label: new nation needed time to gain economic and military strength
Constitution prohibited the United States from making treaties
United States should not acquire new territory by force
United States should establish alliances with both France and Britain

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
